name: Imaging Scoring
description: Scoring template for Imaging super-sector patents. Includes image processing, sensor technology, and display metrics.

questions.question: How fundamental is this patent to image processing algorithms? Consider enhancement, filtering, segmentation, feature extraction, and computational photography.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe the image processing techniques and their applications.

questions.question: How relevant is this patent to imaging sensor technology? Consider CMOS/CCD sensors, HDR, low-light performance, and novel sensing approaches.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify sensor technologies and their advantages.

questions.question: How does this patent improve display technology or image rendering? Consider color accuracy, HDR display, refresh rates, and visual quality.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe display or rendering improvements and their visual impact.
